name: Josh Keezer
review: this is a nice  but quick visit to get good views of the city   around the tower is has several options for tryingocsl food   there are also autobikes  small powers cars  for the kids to ride

name: Jocelyn ying
review: it s quite worth to have a short stay here  we came here for the night view  but the time a bit early  so we also have some wall and rest at the park down the tower  the view of morning and night of the tower are different  so after became dark  we bought tickets and go up to see sokcho night view  it s very quiet when we there so we able  took a lot of photos at upstairs and there s not so many people  after see the night view  we came down again for it s night time colored tower

name: El탉bieta Lasota
review: tower in sokcho  you can buy a ticket  take an elevator and enjoy the view on sokcho  however  i think the view from bridge is better since you can see seoraksan mountains

name: Bruna Yukari Fujii Yoshida
review: amazing view  it s a cheap entry ticket you can observe the river and the mountains and drink coffee at the coffee shop  definitely a must go when you visit sokcho

name: John Tinsworth
review: it s 5 000 won to go up  good view of the city and mountains  but there isn t much to see  it looks cooler from the outside than inside  if you want a nice panoramic view you ll get one  but i m not sure it s worth it

name: Brian Reams
review: some nice night views of the inner harbor lake area of sokcho  didn t go at day  but as others have said  the outside of the glass could be clearer  this is not exceptionally tall  for those who fear heights  or expensive crowded  for those who fear tourist traps    price was 1500 won and there was no wait for elevators in either direction  at that price  it s definitely still worth a quick trip up

name: Cho Caren

name: Robert Helvie
review: not too tall  but nice views of the area  good for a short while and the price was okay  i suppose a night view might be interesting  but then you d lose the view of the distant mountains

name: Abdullah Al Marouf
review: a very famous observation tower in sokcho  the ticket price is not expensive  you can enjoy the whole area to ride on this  the infrastructure and interior design of that tower is amazing  the place is very clean and attractive  many restaurant  qsr  coffee shops  motel are nearby place  if you re in sokcho i recommend you to go there
